summary: Contemporary Moscow. When eighteen-year-old Pasha rescues a beautiful young woman from a band of strangely powerful attackers, he discovers an underworld of supernatural beings living among us.
cast: Ivan Yankovskiy|Leonid Yarmolnik|Lyubov Aksyonova|Sabina Akhmedova|Mikhail Evlanov|Ekaterina Volkova|Konstantin Adaev|Kristina Babushkina|Yuriy Vaksman|Aleksey Dmitriev|Igor Vernik|Anastasiya Tsoy|Denis Buzin|Pradyumna Chatterjee|Oleg Gostik|Viktor Elizarov|Yakov Efimov|Viktor Lider|Vladislav Medvedev|Ilya Pozdnyakov|Vladislav Erovikov|James Tratas|Andrey Zolotukhin|Aleksey Maksimenkov|Vladimir Novikov|Sergey Samorodov|Elena Khodzhaeva
keywords: moscow|vampire versus vampire|secret police unit|battle for throne|vampire royalty
title: Guardians of the Night
